events.title: Inter/NIT Results Out!
events.content: The 2023/24 Inter NIT Tournaments in all sports have concluded recently, with the teams of NIT Kurukshetra putting forth a valiant effort and contributing to a successful event. The university's athletes showcased their dedication and sportsmanship, resulting in commendable performances across various disciplines.

events.title: New Library Inauguration!
events.content: The new library at NIT Kurukshetra was inaugurated with modern facilities and a large collection of books to enhance the learning experience for students.

events.title: Alumni Meet 2024!
events.content: NIT Kurukshetra hosted its annual alumni meet, welcoming graduates from various batches to reconnect and share their experiences with current students.

events.title: Valorant Tournament in NIT
events.content: The much/awaited Valorant Tournament is Live! Antriksh Kumar, the best player of the tournament, has been awarded a cash prize of Rs. 10,000, and Aditya Karna has been declared the worst Valorant player of the tournament.

events.title: Campus Placement Success!
events.content: The placement season at NIT Kurukshetra has been a huge success, with many students securing offers from top companies in various industries.

events.title: Cultural Fest Brings Vibrancy!
events.content: The Cultural Fest at NIT Kurukshetra brought vibrant performances, music, and dance, showcasing the diverse talents of the students.

events.title: Workshop on AI and Machine Learning
events.content: A special workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning was conducted by the CSE department, attended by faculty and students to explore cutting/edge technologies and their applications.

events.title: Hackathon 2024
events.content: The annual Hackathon event was successfully held at NIT Kurukshetra, with students participating in innovative problem/solving and coding challenges.

events.title: Faculty Development Program
events.content: A faculty development program on modern teaching techniques and research methodologies was held at NIT Kurukshetra, aiming to enhance academic excellence.

events.title: Coding Bootcamp 2024
events.content: A two/week intensive coding bootcamp was organized, helping students develop their programming skills and prepare for tech competitions.

events.title: NIT Sports Day 2024
events.content: NIT Kurukshetra celebrated its annual Sports Day with great enthusiasm, featuring multiple competitions in athletics and team sports.

events.title: Research Symposium 2024
events.content: A research symposium was held at NIT Kurukshetra, where faculty presented their research papers and discussed future collaborations in academic research.

events.title: Annual Science Fair 2024
events.content: Students from various departments displayed their science and engineering projects at the annual science fair, showcasing innovations and creative problem/solving.

events.title: New Research Lab Inauguration
events.content: A new state/of/the/art research laboratory was inaugurated at NIT Kurukshetra, boosting faculty and student research capabilities.

events.title: Cultural Evening 2024
events.content: The Cultural Evening organized by the Student Council featured performances from different cultures, making it a vibrant celebration of diversity.

events.title: Faculty/Student Interaction Program
events.content: An interaction program was organized to foster better collaboration and communication between faculty and students, focusing on improving the academic environment.
